header.title: Virginia Roberts says she ‘had sex’ with Prince Andrew in a loo when she was 17
header.postText: Virginia Roberts Giuffre says Prince Andrew ‘was an abuser’ who had ‘sex with her in a toilet’ when she was 17.', 'She also accused the royal of giving her vodka at a London nightclub in 2001.', 'Ms Giuffre made the revelations as part of an interview due to be aired tonight with NBC’s Dateline.', 'She will be joined by three others who have never spoken before about their allegations.', 'In a pre-released clip with NBC News’ Savannah Guthrie, Ms Giuffre called Prince Andrew an ‘abuser’ and a ‘participant’.', 'She claims her first sexual encounter with Prince Andrew took place in a London townhouse owned by Jeffrey Epstein’s ‘madam’, Ghislaine Maxwell.', 'She told NBC: ‘The first time in London, I was so young. Ghislaine woke me up in the morning and said, “You’re gonna meet a prince today.”', '‘I didn’t know at that point that I was going to be trafficked to a prince.', '‘We went out to Club Tramp. Prince Andrew got me alcohol, it was in the VIP section. I’m pretty sure it was vodka.', '‘He was like, “Let’s dance”. I was like, “OK”. We leave club Tramp and I hop in the car with Ghislaine and Jeffrey.', '‘She says, “he’s coming back to the house and I want you to do for him what you do for Epstein.”', 'She then says the pair had sex in the toilet of Ghislaine’s townhouse.', 'She added: ‘He wasn’t rude or anything about it, he said, “thank you” and some kind of soft sentiments like that and left’.', 'Buckingham Palace says it ‘emphatically’ denies the Duke of York had ‘any form of sexual contact or relationship with Virginia Roberts’.', 'A previous Palace statement said: ‘The Duke of York has been appalled by the recent reports of Jeffrey Epstein’s alleged crimes.', '‘His Royal Highness deplores the exploitation of any human being and the suggestion he would condone, participate in or encourage any such behaviour is abhorrent.’

commentThread.commentText: A "Royal Prince" is invited to a party in a townhouse by an American billionaire and ends up having sex in the loo.The so called "elite" certainly know how to enjoy themselves, no Travel Lodge with a double bed for them.
She worked for a madame at 17?

'I didn't know at that point i was going to be trafficked to a prince', so she didn't mind if it were a nobody (if they had money). If she were 'so young' why isn't she also blamingGhislaine, her parents etc. She's no Charlie innocent in this, and is coming out in a bad light.
